Description:
Detect the use of processes with no name (".exe"), which can be used to evade Image-based detections.

Author: Matt Anderson (Huntress)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Process Launched Without Image Name
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where process_path like '%\.exe'
